content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Biomedical Research Council" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Biomedical Research Council** ([Abbreviation](/wiki/Abbreviation): **BMRC**; [Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 生物医药研究理事会) is a [research](/wiki/Research) [council](/wiki/Committee) in Singapore, established in October 2000. This research council supports, oversees and coordinates public sector [biomedical research](/wiki/Biomedical_research) and development activities in Singapore. The Council works in close partnership with the [Economic Development Board](/wiki/Economic_Development_Board)’s (EDB) Biomedical Sciences Group and Bio*One Capital. - A*star website This Singaporean organisation article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Biomedical Research Council
